Class ColsWithAlikeElementsFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.prutzkow.twodimarray.TwoDimArray
      • com.prutzkow.twodimarray.Matrix
        • ru.rsreu.tryinkin0418.ColsWithAlikeElementsFinder

  • public class ColsWithAlikeElementsFinder
extends com.prutzkow.twodimarray.Matrix
    A container of methods to find the indexes of columns with alike elements of matrix.
